resources.string: Hello, I am Zenbo. Nice to meet you.

Let me tell you how to dance with me! You can move around and I will dance with you, as well as when you wear the watch and launch the watch sensor app, You can also make different hand poses, and I will correspond to different dance steps.
Which style music do you like to dance with me?
Let\'s Dancing now! It\'s our show time!
You should try to dance happier move more steps and do more poses.
You did a good job! But you can try more actions and poses to let zenbo dance.
You did a great job! Try different poses as much as you can!
Wonderful! You are a dancing genius!
Raise your hands in front of your face and watch your watch.
Great! Shake your butt with me!
Good job! Turn around with me!
